reviewText: I have read several reviews of the MICHAEL DOUGLAS 4 FILM FAVORITES dvd set saying that DISCLOSURE is on both sides of the dvd. I received my copy in the mail yesterday and COMA is on the other side of the DISCLOSURE dvd. FALLING DOWN & A PERFECT MURDER are on the other dvd

I bought this set because I wanted to own "Coma" and "Disclosure."  "Coma" is not included in this set.  The movie "Disclosure" plays and both sides of one disc and the quality is pretty bad.  "A Perfect Murder" and "Falling Down" have better quality but I personally didn't like the "Falling Down" movie.  I recommend buying the movies you want separately.

This is only a review of the DVD as I liked all 4 films a little more than the 3-star rating.  However, there are only three films included in the DVD set that I received.  Coma was missing and Disclosure was on both sides of Disc 2 so unless my disc was an aberration, you should only expect 3 films from this 4 film favorites DVD.  Transfer quality appears to be a just a shade below that of a single DVD but that's to be expected.  All-in-all, the transfer quality is acceptable but being short changed on Coma is not.
Awesome value!
Michael Douglas doesn't get the accolades he really deserves.  Like his father . . . .  a GREAT actor!!!!!
Movies are good
all 4 movies are very good.
Yes, I did find movies are on both sides of DVD...had not thought to turn DVD over until I read someone else's comment.  Will always try this in the future.

The reason I only gave it 3 stars is because one of the movies, Coma, was missing. The other 3 movies were really good. But I was very disappointed that a movie was missing. I did get a credit for the missing movie but it still was aggravating that the set did`nt come complete.  :(

disappointed that only one I could watch was falling down, which I really enjoyed. disclosure ceased to play after a certain point, despite numerous retries, cleaning, etc. the other two movies would not play. too much hassle to return; oh, well, I enjoyed the one!! shipping was fast and the item was well-packed. I have no doubt the seller would have taken steps to remedy the situation, but I did not make it known, so I would not hesitate to order from the seller again.
